CustomField.description: ECLM - Used by Apex Batch "OpportunityFixedTermRenewal_Batchable" - The number of days before the Contract End Date that a Fixed Term Opportunity should be cloned as a “Renewal”.

CustomField.label: OFTR - Days Before End Date
